title: Looking for Lost Bird: A Jewish Woman Discovers Her Navajo Roots
description: In this haunting memoir, Yvette Melanson tells of being raised to believe that she was white and Jewish. At age forty-three, she learned that she was a "Lost Bird," a Navajo child taken against her family's wishes, and that her grieving birth mother had never stopped looking for her until the day she died.
author: Yvette Melanson
